name: How Smart Is Your Cat? Fun Ways to Find Out!
name_original: How Smart Is Your Cat? Fun Ways to Find Out!
description:
Packed with intelligence tests and easy-to-teach tricks, discover your cat’s IQ.

• Teach your cat to play ball, high five, play hide and seek and sit on your shoulder
• Test your pet’s feline intelligence and see how they compare to other cats
Boast to your friends about how smart (...or otherwise) your cat really is
